post.description: Create a new user account with email, phone, password, and name. Returns JWT tokens and user profile. Rate limited to 3 registrations per hour per IP.

post.description: Authenticate user with email/phone and password. Includes device fingerprinting for security. May require device verification if logging in from a new device. Rate limited to 5 attempts per 15 minutes.

403.description: Account locked due to too many failed attempts

post.description: Send a 6-digit verification code to the user email for password reset. Rate limited to 3 requests per hour.

post.description: Verify the 6-digit code sent to email. Returns a reset token to be used for password reset.

post.description: Set a new password using the reset token obtained from verify-reset-code endpoint.

example.message: Password reset successfully. You can now login with your new password.

phone.description: Nigerian phone number (with or without country code)

password.description: User password (must contain uppercase, lowercase, and number/special character)

deviceInfo.description: Device information for device fingerprinting and security tracking

email.description: Email address to send password reset code
Email address that received the reset code

account_number.description: Bank Account Number (10 digits) for validation

recipientTag.description: Recipient user tag (3-20 characters, lowercase, alphanumeric and underscores)

newPassword.description: New password (min 8 chars, mixed case, numbers/special chars)

dateOfBirth.description: Date of Birth (YYYY-MM-DD) matching BVN record
Date of Birth (YYYY-MM-DD) matching NIN record
